summary: Five Finger Death Punch, often shortened to 5FDP or FFDP, is an American heavy metal band from Las Vegas, formed in 2005. The band has had several lineup changes over the years, with Zoltan Bathory being the only original member left. They released their first album, *The Way of the Fist*, in 2007, which quickly became popular. Their next albums, like *War Is the Answer* (2009) and *American Capitalist* (2011), also did very well, earning platinum certifications. The band has played at big music festivals and won many awards, including "Indie Artist of the Year" four times. They've released nine studio albums so far, with their latest, *AfterLife*, coming out in 2022.
title: Five Finger Death Punch
